item.title: To record or not to record
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction The direct benefits of recording as much as you can The indirect benefits of recording as much as you can Some musings on handwritten notes Concluding points Introduction This is an outline of my thoughts on the benefits of maintaining a comprehensive record in your work life. While I’ve split my points into direct and indirect benefits of maintaining such a record - the distinguishment is much more an indication of the possibilities, rather than a strong demarcation.
